swfobject.embedSWF("FlashContent.swf", "myContent", "550", "400", "9.0.0", "expressInstall.swf",flashvars,params,attributes);

var flashvars={
name1:"hello",
name2:"world",
name3:"foobar"
};
var params={
menu:"false"
};
var attributes={
id:"mengtianwxs",
name:"myDynamicContent"
};

--------------------------------------------------

var flashvars={};
flashvars.name1="hello";
